duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain backend cloud services and databases using Java and Spring Boot stack.
Create and maintain microservices and APIs using best practices and Rest API standards.
Debug and maintain messaging frameworks such as Rabbit MQ in a production environment.
Work with NOSQL (SOLR, Cassandra, MongoDB) and SQL databases (SOL Server, Oracle) for data storage and retrieval.
Utilize Docker, Kubernetes, and GCP or Azure for containerization and cloud services.
Design, architect, and develop RESTful Microservices in an enterprise production environment.
Participate in 24/7 production support on a rotating basis and contribute to continuous integration and deployment.
Utilize code versioning tools like Git and GitHub and adhere to Lean/Agile development methodologies.
Demonstrate strong analytical and problem-solving skills in software development.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field (Master's preferred)
